meanings.sent1: The unissued tickets were still in the box.
meanings.sent2: The unissued stamps were neatly stacked in the drawer.
meanings.sent3: The unissued invitations missed the party and felt left out.
meanings.sent4: The unissued report loomed over the deadline like a dark cloud.
meanings.sent5: The unissued certificates sat silently, waiting to be claimed.

meanings.sent1: The unissued newspapers remained untouched on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The unissued flyers were piling up in the storage room.
meanings.sent3: The unissued coupons felt like forgotten treasures in the drawer.
meanings.sent4: The unissued ballots held the power of choice yet to be unleashed.
meanings.sent5: The unissued permits were like hidden gems, waiting to be discovered.
